options.formula:
IF(
  FIND("Google", {flddMt8UYMb5dqPRI}),
  20,
  IF(
    FIND("Microsoft", {flddMt8UYMb5dqPRI}),
    20,
    IF(
      FIND("Outlook", {flddMt8UYMb5dqPRI}),
      5,
      IF(
        OR(
          FIND("SMTP", {flddMt8UYMb5dqPRI}),
          FIND("Custom Mail Server", {flddMt8UYMb5dqPRI})
        ),
        10,
        BLANK()
      )
    )
  )
)

IF(
  {fldUYO5AbQb26uS2C} & "" = "",
  "No Score âŒ",

    {fldUYO5AbQb26uS2C} > 80,

      {fldUYO5AbQb26uS2C} > 40,
      "Recovery ðŸŸ¡",

    )
  )
)

)

IF(

  "â” INSUFFICIENT DATA",

    "âš ï¸ DELIVERABILITY ISSUE",

options.formula:
IF(
  AND(
    {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY},
    DATETIME_FORMAT({flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, "YYYY-MM") = DATETIME_FORMAT(TODAY(), "YYYY-MM"),
    {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY} <= TODAY()
  ),
  "âœ… YES",
  "âŒ NO"
)

IF(
  AND(
    {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY},
    OR(
      IS_AFTER({flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, DATEADD(TODAY(), -7, 'days')),
      IS_SAME({flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, DATEADD(TODAY(), -7, 'days'), 'day')
    )
  ),
  "âœ… YES",
  "âŒ NO"
)

IF(
  {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY},
  IF(
    DATETIME_FORMAT({flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, "YYYY-MM") = DATETIME_FORMAT(TODAY(), "YYYY-MM"),
    "Current Month",
    IF(
      DATETIME_FORMAT({flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, "YYYY-MM") = DATETIME_FORMAT(DATEADD(TODAY(), -1, "month"), "YYYY-MM"),
      "Previous Month",
      "Other"
    )
  )
)

IF(
  AND(
    {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY},
    DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, 'days') <= 7
  ),
  "last 7",
  IF(
    AND(
      {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY},
      DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, 'days') > 7,
      DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, 'days') <= 14
    ),
    "last 14",
    "Older"
  )
)

IF(
  AND(
    {flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY},
    OR(
      IS_AFTER({flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, DATEADD(TODAY(), -30, 'days')),
      IS_SAME({flddxI9v0GuFt5LmY}, DATEADD(TODAY(), -30, 'days'), 'day')
    )
  ),
  "âœ… YES",
  "âŒ NO"
)

IF(
  AND(
    {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf},
    DATETIME_FORMAT({fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, "YYYY-MM") = DATETIME_FORMAT(TODAY(), "YYYY-MM"),
    {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf} <= TODAY()
  ),
  "âœ… YES",
  "âŒ NO"
)

IF(
  AND(
    {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf},
    OR(
      IS_AFTER({fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, DATEADD(TODAY(), -7, 'days')),
      IS_SAME({fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, DATEADD(TODAY(), -7, 'days'), 'day')
    )
  ),
  "âœ… YES",
  "âŒ NO"
)

IF(
  {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf},
  IF(
    DATETIME_FORMAT({fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, "YYYY-MM") = DATETIME_FORMAT(TODAY(), "YYYY-MM"),
    "Current Month",
    IF(
      DATETIME_FORMAT({fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, "YYYY-MM") = DATETIME_FORMAT(DATEADD(TODAY(), -1, "month"), "YYYY-MM"),
      "Previous Month",
      "Other"
    )
  )
)

IF(
  AND(
    {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf},
    DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, 'days') <= 7
  ),
  "last 7",
  IF(
    AND(
      {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf},
      DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, 'days') > 7,
      DATETIME_DIFF(TODAY(), {fldSRw0ip6P39TNnf}, 'days') <= 14
    ),
    "last 14",
    "Older"
  )
)

fields.name: Who should we say is reaching out to homeowners on behalf of your agency?
Professional Title of Person reaching out

choices.name: Leave it up to us (we'll optimize based on perroamnce)
Match my existing style (we'll review your current materials)

fields.name: Send Link To Book Onboarding Call?

choices.name: 200+ Leads (Need better conversion, not more volume)

fields.name: What's your current monthly lead volume and how satisfied are you with it?
What's your average commission per home insurance policy sold?

choices.name: Poor quality leads that don't convert
Leads are not local to my area
Too much competition for the same leads
Leads go cold before i can contact them

fields.name: What's been your biggest frustration with lead generation so far?

choices.name: Converting 10%+ of my guaranteed leads to policies
Getting my money back within 60 days from conversions
Consistent quality - every lead is real homeowner
Being able to upgrade to a higher volume plan
3:1 ROI or better on my Monthly Investment

fields.name: What would make this partnership a huge win for you?
With your guaranteed lead volume, what conversion rate would make you thrilled?

choices.name: Leads that are clearly fake or unqualified
Less than 80% of guaranteed monthly volume delivered
Leads consistently outside of my service area

fields.name: What would make yo uwant to cancel or downgrade your plan

choices.name: Policy renewal time (shopping for better rates)

Who are your main competitors locally?
What makes you different/better than your competitors?
What's your unique value proposition we should highlight in campaigns?
What objections do prospects typically have, and how do you overcome them?

choices.name: Good starting point to test quality
Right volume for my current capacity
Best value for my growth goals
Maximum i can handle right now

fields.name: What made you choose this specific plan?
How do you plan to measure success with your guaranteed leads?

choices.name: Very likely - looking to scale quickly

fields.name: If your plan performs well, how likely are you to upgrade to a higher volume package?

choices.name: 10 - This is a top priority, will do whatever it takes
8-9 - Very committed, will be responsive and engaged
6-7 - moderately committed, hope it works out
5 or below - Just testing things out

fields.name: 33. On a scale of 1-10, how committed are you to making this lead generation campaign successful?

Sample of Your Current Communication Style:
What Names you want to use for sending?
What did I work on today? (Main tasks like campaign audits and campaigns, not everything in detail)

choices.name: No - i will prioritize and sort tasks for tomorrow, then proactively communicate with team regarding the tasks

fields.name: Did I complete/work on all the tasks assigned to me for today?

choices.name: No - before i log out today i'll update it

fields.name: Is ToDoIst up to date with all tasks for my assigned tasks?

choices.name: No - i will communicate right now with everyone ensuring i left no unanswered questions before i log out

fields.name: I proactively communicated with clients and teammates, keeping them fully in the loop and leaving no questions or requests unanswered.
Am I stuck on anything or waiting on any team members for something that's taking too long? If so, what?
Did I encounter any roadblocks or obstacles with systems/workflows? (e.g. system is not efficient/working, software not working/slow, client/team member being slow responding with feedback etc...)
If yes, what was it and what's my feedback on improving the system/workflow?
Iâ€™m proud and satisfied of how I showed up and performed today.
I took full ownership of my tasks and outcomes today (I treated my tasks like they were my own business, I was dependable and made sure results were delivered.)
What are my main priorities for tomorrow? (if itâ€™s Friday, share priorities and goals for the next week)
